tips.text: Double-click any bookmark card or table row to open the link in a new tab!
Press Alt+A to quickly add a new bookmark from anywhere in the app.
Click on any tag to instantly search for all bookmarks with that tag.
In table view, use checkboxes to select multiple bookmarks for bulk deletion.
The Smart Hub automatically groups related bookmarks using AI - check it out!
Visit the Smart Hub to rediscover bookmarks you haven't used in a while.
When adding bookmarks, URLs in your clipboard are automatically detected and filled in.
You can import bookmarks from Firefox, Chrome, or Edge using HTML export files in your profile settings.
Toggle compact mode to fit more bookmarks on your screen at once.
Use the favorites filter to quickly find your most important bookmarks.
When adding bookmarks, titles are automatically extracted from the webpage for convenience.
Visit the tag management page to rename or delete tags across all your bookmarks.
The search function looks through titles, URLs, descriptions, and tags to find what you need.
Save your search results as a smart collection for easy access later.
Check out the random bookmark section in Smart Hub to rediscover forgotten gems.
Toggle dark mode in your profile settings for comfortable viewing in low light.
Adjust how many bookmarks are shown per page, or view all at once using the pagination controls.
Switch between grid and table view to find the layout that works best for you.
